Text: John Bank of Montreal would like to take Enron up on the offer you made this afternoon to help balance our short swap exposure with your organization and replace it with a third party Enron may have offsetting transactions with Per our conversation to offset the contracts that we are short to Enron our position would allow us to accommodate the following transactions Buying five and a half contracts a day December Z natural gas last day swaps from Enron and selling to a third party Buying sixteen and a half contracts a day January through December FZ natural gas last day swaps from Enron and selling to a third party Buying four contracts a day April through October JV natural gas last day swaps from Enron and selling to a third party Buying two contracts a day January through December FZ natural gas last day swaps from Enron and selling to a third party If you find an appropriate offsetting positions please contact me at Thank you David DeVeny Bank of Montreal Commodity Derivatives Group FONT SIZE This email and any attachments may contain confidential and privileged information If you are not the intended recipient please notify the sender immediately by return email delete this email and destroy any copies Any dissemination or use of this information by a person other than the intended recipient is unauthorized and may be illegal Unless otherwise stated opinions expressed in this email are those of the author and are not endorsed by the authors employerFONT
